Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Interface UI

All Known Implementing Classes:
CLI, GUI
public interface UI
Represents the Client's User Interface, which is implemented by the GUI and the CLI. It contains methods which allows the parsing of the messages from the server to the client, methods which allows sending messages from the client to the server, methods which allows to perform on the client the action requested by the message received by the server (those actions can be: simple messages intended to inform the client about an event, notifications of any change in the View, messages containing questions and requiring an answer)

  • Method Summary

    • getServerIp

      java.lang.String getServerIp()
      Returns:
      the String provided by the client as the IP address of the server he wants to connect to

      Parameters:
      message - the ToClientMessage to parse

      Parameters:
      body - the boolean to send to the server in the SendBoolean Message

    • chooseCards

      void chooseCards​(java.util.ArrayList<CardView> possibleCards, int num, java.util.ArrayList<CardView> pickedCards)
      Allows asking the client to choose some Cards among those available.
      Parameters:
      possibleCards - an ArrayList containing all the CardViews representing the possible Cards
      num - the number of Cards to choose
      pickedCards - an ArrayList containing all the CardViews representing the already picked Cards

    • chooseGameName

      void chooseGameName​(boolean taken)
      Allows asking the client to choose a Game name.
      Parameters:
      taken - true if the previously chosen Game name is already taken, false otherwise

    • chooseGameRoom

      void chooseGameRoom​(java.util.ArrayList<GameView> gameRooms)
      Allows asking the client to choose which Game Room to join.
      Parameters:
      gameRooms - an ArrayList of GameViews containing all the Game Rooms

    • chooseNickname

      void chooseNickname​(boolean taken)
      Allows asking the client to choose a nickname.
      Parameters:
      taken - true if the previously chosen nickname is already taken, false otherwise

    • choosePlayersNumber

      void choosePlayersNumber()
      Allows asking the client to choose the number of Players for the Game.

    • choosePosition

      void choosePosition​(java.util.ArrayList<CellView> positions, java.lang.String desc)
      Allows asking the client to choose a position among those available.
      Parameters:
      positions - an ArrayList containing CellViews representing all the available positions
      desc - the reason of this choice

    • chooseStartingPlayer

      void chooseStartingPlayer​(java.util.ArrayList<PlayerView> players)
      Allows asking the client to choose the Player which will start playing.
      Parameters:
      players - an ArrayList of PlayerViews representing all the Players involved in the Game

    • chooseStartJoin

      void chooseStartJoin()
      Allows asking the client to choose between starting a new Game or joining an existing one.

    • chooseYesNo

      void chooseYesNo​(java.lang.String query)
      Allows asking the client a "yes or no question" and sending it to the server.
      Parameters:
      query - the question to ask to the client

    • displayBuild

      void displayBuild​(CellView buildPosition, CardView godCard)
      Allows displaying a build.
      Parameters:
      buildPosition - the CellView representing the position of the building
      godCard - the CardView representing the God Card which eventually allowed this build

    • displayGameInfo

      void displayGameInfo​(GameView game, java.lang.String desc)
      Allows displaying an information about the Game.
      Parameters:
      game - the GameView representing the current state of the Game
      desc - the information

    • displayMessage

      void displayMessage​(java.lang.String message)

    • displayMove

      void displayMove​(java.util.HashMap<CellView,​CellView> moves, CardView godCard)
      Allows displaying the move of a Worker.
      Parameters:
      moves - an HashMap containing pairs of (starting position, final position) for each worker who moved or was forced to move
      godCard - the CardView representing the God Card which eventually allowed this move

    • displayPlaceWorker

      void displayPlaceWorker​(CellView position)
      Allows displaying the starting position of a Worker.
      Parameters:
      position - the starting position of a Worker

    • notifyDisconnection

      void notifyDisconnection​(PlayerView player)
      Allows notifying the client of the disconnection of a Player.
      Parameters:
      player - the PlayerView representing the Player who disconnected

    • notifyGameOver

      void notifyGameOver()
      Allows notifying the client the Game is over.

    • notifyGameStarting

      void notifyGameStarting()
      Allows notifying the client the Game is starting.

    • notifyLoss

      void notifyLoss​(java.lang.String reason, PlayerView winner)
      Allows notifying the client of his loss.
      Parameters:
      reason - the reason of his loss
      winner - the Player who eventually won, can be null

    • notifyWin

      void notifyWin​(java.lang.String reason)
      Allows notifying the client of his victory.
      Parameters:
      reason - the reason of the victory

    • serverClosed

      void serverClosed()
      Allows notifying the client that the server is down.
